comments.body: Maybe special treat the case where `path` is `nil` here, so that you conserve the entry without ever stealing anything from it.

Yes much better.

At first I excluded to use `nil` because I didn't want to enforce `Path` to be something "nullable", e.g. if we want to change it to a struct in the future. I think it's OK to use nil for now though :-) 

I force-pushed here: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/commit/6c86e89390e262cc54be647bc09328a4d8d654fb
